named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Product product WHERE product.name LIKE :name

named-query.name: BC_READ_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Product product, IN(product.allSkus) sku WHERE sku.id = :skuId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.Product product, IN(product.allSkus) sku WHERE sku.id = :skuId AND product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR product.activeEndDate = null)

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_PRODUCTS_BY_CATEGORY
named-query.query: SELECT categoryProductXref.product FROM org.broadleafcommerce.catalog.domain.CategoryProduct categoryProductXref WHERE categoryProductXref.category.id = :categoryId AND categoryProductXref.product.activeStartDate <= :currentDate AND (categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate > :currentDate OR categoryProductXref.product.activeEndDate = null) ORDER BY categoryProductXref.displayOrder
